member.name: T:Intuit.Ipp.Utility.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Intuit.IPP.Util has utility related information. -DateHelper class: A helper function for date-related problems. -RequestXmlCollection: A helper class which is used to build API xml request object. -IEntitySerializer: An interface for serialization and deserialization. Implement IEntitySerializer for custom serialization and deserialization. The XmlObjectSerializer implements IEntitySerializer for xml serialization and deserilazation.

member.name: P:Intuit.Ipp.Utility.RequestLogElement.EnableRequestResponseLogging
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to log request and response messages.

member.summary: Default value used to indicate that compression is not specified in the config.

member.name: F:Intuit.Ipp.Utility.SerializationFormat.Json
member.summary: Java Script Obejct Notation Serialization Format.

member.name: F:Intuit.Ipp.Utility.DateHelper.EpochJanFirst1970Utc
member.summary: Defined as January 1st, 1970 UTC. Used in various ways as a reference point for date arithmetic.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.Utility.DateHelper.ParseDateTimeField(System.String)
member.summary: Assuming the value represents a date or date/time returned by a query, parses the timestamp and converts it to a local date/time.
member.param: the time stamp returned by the query
member.returns: the local time or date represented by the time stamp, or DateTime.MinValue if not a valid time stamp

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.Utility.DateHelper.GetLocalDateFromQuickBaseDate(System.Int64)
member.summary: A so-called "QuickBaseDate" is a date used by Intuit QuickBase (and WorkPlace, if the app uses QuickBase as the underlying data store), which is stored as the number of milliseconds since 1/1/1970 00:00:00 UTC. This function returns the local equivalent of that date.
member.param: a date returned from QuickBase as part of a query
member.returns: the local equivalent of that date as a DateTime object
